    scriptè„šæœ¬ä»£ç ï¼š

    :global addold

 :set addnew [/interface get [/interface find name="pppoe-out1"] running]
 :if ($addnew=true) do={
  :set addold [/ip address get [/ip address find dynamic=yes interface="pppoe-out1"] address]

}
